article: Peter was on holiday in a small fishing village near the sea. One day, he saw a localtaking  _  the fish out of his boat while he was walking  _  the beach. "How do you  deal with  the rest of your day?" "I play with my children,  _  time with my wife, and visit my friends and play cards."
